= Properties =
A Rough Turning operation has all common operation properties, see here:
http://code.google.com/p/heekscnc/wiki/Operations

===outside===
Specify if the machining will be done on the outside or inside of the bar.

===front===
Specify if the machining will be done on the front or back of the bar.

===facing===
Specify if the cuts will be in Z ( horizontal ) or in X ( vertical ).

http://heekscnc.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/turning/modes.png

===clearance===
the distance around the bar that the tool must not rapid in; the moves must become feed moves at this distance before starting to cut into the bar.
